Paragraph: 18,19 However , to the best of our knowledge , BT / BO - based polymers simultaneously with high field - effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance are very rare so far.

| high field-effect mobilities |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high field-effect mobilities |
| high photovoltaic performance |
| BT / BO-based polymers |

Note: In this context, "rare" does not refer to a material property, but rather a statement about the occurrence or availability of certain materials with both high field-effect mobilities and high photovoltaic performance. Therefore, it is not included in the table.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. "Rare" and "So far" do not refer to material properties, but rather to the occurrence or availability of the BT/BO-based polymers with the desired properties.
